about.title: About
about.subtitle: 21Points is an app you can use to monitor your health.

parrafo.01: Its rules were simple, you can earn up to three points per day for the following reasons:
parrafo.02:
• If you eat healthy, you get a point. Otherwise, zero.
  • If you exercise, you get a point.
  • If you don't drink alcohol, you get a point.
parrafo.03: You can choose a weekly goal by default is 10 points.
parrafo.04: It also shows you graphically the evolution of your blood pressure and weight of the past few days, 30 default.
parrafo.05:
No need to create an account to prove, simply click Continue.
This will create an account with dummy data that can manipulate but is automatically erased.
parrafo.06: If you want to create an account for you to enter data from being erased, I encourage you to do not give your real email and use a temporary email.
parrafo.07: This application started as the sample application for 'JHipster Mini-Book', written by Matt Raible.
parrafo.08:
• All application code on GitHub.
  • The web jhipster.
